Plintissa shook her head laughing at how stupid Ramhorns story was...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 7:32 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Ramhorn/Injector/Manterror/Double Punch:
>
> (Lizrads, Double Punch is in a stealth mode that cloaks him from all
views,
> please read better, so I won't be accepting that sweep to the invisible
> Double Punch)
>
> Manterror and Injector stood their ground, the optic blasts hitting them,
but
> not knocking them back, though each grunted in pain.
>
> Manterror raised both arms once more, firing two ion disks at Mantella's
left
> shoulder, two at her abdomen.
>
> Injector growled.  "Die, die, die,die!" raising his launcher, he fired off
> two stinger missiles at Mantella's chest.
>
> Double Punch sighed, yelling.  "Why won't you get hit by the missiles you
> stupid cockroach!" raising his arms in anger, he fired two missiles at the
> downed Quickstrike, Beeline diving in, firing an optic blast at Mantella's
> gut.
>
> ==============
>
> Ramhorn looked up at the now giant Iron Raptor.  "Holy slag...I had no
idea
> anyone could do that..."
> "Oh, errr...Stinkbomb," he said, trying to clear his mind.  "That weird
guy
> responded to a distress signal from Stinkbomb inside the Ark's bridge when
I
> guess his logic circuitry was damaged.  He had attacked me earlier, him
> winning the fight.  Upon Suukie's arrival, Suukie ignored the pleads,
gripped
> Stinkbomb by the throat, then threw him back to the ground.  Stinkbomb
then
> opened fire, obviously confused, unfortunately so did Stuukie, and they
both
> fell.  I then left to the CR chambers, crawling.  When I got out and got
some
> weapons from the armory just in case, I came to find Suukie opening fire
on
> an unconscious Stinkbomb.  Afraid for my friend's life, I opened fire on
> Suukie, who had somehow been repaired from powerful laser blasts to the
head,
> then that weirdo," he said, referring to Plintissa, "came in and "rescued"
> him.  Helping him escape justice.  Justice not being killing him, I was
> trying to knock him down so I could try and restrain him.  And I'm sorry
if I
> got confused, but  when arriving here, there weapons drawn, and facing
you,
> and that other person, I jumped to the conclusion you two were under
attack,
> ma'am." he said, pointing to Zenyak (not knowing he was a Predacon), still
a
> little amazed at the ginormous beast mode.
>
>
